content.title: Chief Ministergi Artistesinggi Tengbang (CMAT) – Scheme Of Festival Assistance For Participating In International & National Festival
content.department: Department of Art and Culture, Govt. of Manipur
content.beneficiary: Artists participating in International & National Festivals
content.details: This scheme provides financial assistance to artists participating in international and national festivals.
benefits: Reimbursement of expenditure through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT)
Support for three artists for International Festivals each year
Support for three artists for National Festivals each year
eligibility: Must be a resident/domicile of the state of Manipur
exclusions: Applicants from outside the state of Manipur are not eligible
No reservation of slots based on gender
content.application_process: Offline applications only, addressed to the Directorate of Art & Culture, Government of Manipur.
documents_required: Cover letter addressed to the Director (Art & Culture)

faqs.question: Does this scheme accept online applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts offline applications.

faqs.question: By when should the application reach the Directorate of Art & Culture?
faqs.answer: The application should reach the Directorate of Art & Culture latest by a month before the travel schedule.

faqs.question: Can I apply to this scheme if the annual income of my family is more than ₹ 8,00,000?
faqs.answer: There are no income-related criteria for this scheme. You can apply to this scheme irrespective of your family income.

faqs.question: How will the expenditure be reimbursed to the applicant?
faqs.answer: The expenditure will be reimbursed to the applicant through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT).

faqs.question: How many artists will be supported for International Festivals?
faqs.answer: Every year three artists will be supported for International Festivals.

faqs.question: How many artists will be supported for National Festivals?
faqs.answer: Every year three artists will be supported for National Festivals.

faqs.question: What shall be the method of selection of the artists for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The selection of artists/groups will be done by a Screening / Selection Committee constituted by the Government.

faqs.question: Does the invitation letter need to be submitted in original or a photocopy?
faqs.answer: The Invitation Letter needs to be submitted in original.

faqs.question: Is this scheme a 'One Family, One Benefit' scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there is no such mention in the scheme guidelines.

faqs.question: Can a domicile of Telangana also apply to this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, in order to be eligible to apply, the applicant should be a resident/domicile of the state of Manipur.

faqs.question: Is there a percentage of slots reserved for female applicants?
faqs.answer: No, there is no reservation of slots based on the gender of the applicant.

faqs.question: Can applicants from Scheduled Castes also apply to this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme is open to all applicants irrespective of their caste.
